metadata.title: CVE-2014-2079 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: X File Explorer (aka xfe) might allow local users to bypass intended accessrestrictions and gain access to arbitrary files by leveraging failure touse directory masks when creating files on Samba and NFS shares.

criterions.comment: xfe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
